channel.title: [REQUEST] Donator Idea's?
channel.description:
Hey! I need some suggestions for my donator zone & Donator point store.
Donator store image: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/21ethj8.jpg[/img] Please don't suggest mainstream items such as Partyhats. Note: The hilts will be replaced with complete godswords.
Donator zone: Please give me the place name and coordinates, I want an unique donator zone, as above, no mainstream/overused place. Also provide a picture if possible :3.
Thanks guys!

item.title: [REQUEST] Donator Idea's?
item.dc:creator: @CoderJessee CoderJessee
item.description:
@CoderJessee wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:41, topic:465563”][quote author=CoderJessee link=topic=571023.msg4138284#msg4138284 date=1351897905]

Tbh: Try adding A Donator sword Or something good for donators only. it will make them donate

Yeah, I might do that :].

Yea, don’t do that.

I will not add like a custom sword, but I might do something like an Anger sword, which will have not very much strength bonus’ or something, but it would of hit alot on donator only NPC’s. I’ll see.

Smart. But if the Donator only NPCs drop ridicules shit…

Need to find a solution for that :P. Might just make the drop rates for them higher then for NPC’s for regular players.
[/quote]
Increase drop rates, give them cosmetic stuff that doesn’t give stat increases…[/quote]
Alright, thanks for the tip.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQUEST] Donator Idea's?
item.dc:creator: @CoderJessee CoderJessee
item.description:
@CoderJessee wrote:

[quote=“havocxwarloc, post:33, topic:465563”]Tbh: Try adding A Donator sword Or something good for donators only. it will make them donate ;)[/quote]’
Yeah, I might do that :].

[quote=“ox random xi, post:34, topic:465563”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=571023.msg4137204#msg4137204 date=1351809676]

If anything, and I stick by my word of not having any donator items, I’d say a spell, or item, that performs the same as an amulet of glory, but has teleports to all major cities. Preferrably using a new interface, instead of a loaded chatbox. It should also have a cooldown period in which it cannot be used again.

This is one thing that I actually liked.
P.S. congrats on global Zyle

He has had Global for ages.

I never noticed it… I remember when he was a greeny.

He had Global before I even came here, haha. I remember, because he was one of our applicants.
[/quote]
I must be high. lol[/quote]
Lol.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQUEST] Donator Idea's?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Loveandpower:

A donation is something that isn’t expected to get something from (i.e. a gift)

Most servers use the term donation just so people don’t get on their dick about selling in game benefits. I personally would sell them on mine, just I wouldn’t call them donations.

OT:

A new area, but have portals that lead to very use yet hard to reach areas. I.E save them like 5-10 minutes of running per trip, depending on what they’re doing.

A few new items maybe, nothing major though, something like the recolored whips and SOLs, each giving a little extra stat bonus in a certain area.

A platebody that gives a 1.5x XP Modifier. I say platebody because making it a ring or amulet puts them at almost no disadvantage, by that I mean they’re getting allot of extra stuff at little sacrifice, but giving up a platebody is a pretty decent defense drop, but may be worth it due to the modifier. Should be bought

A ring that gives them 10% more gold when selling to shops. (I say ring because they’ll only wear it for a few seconds to sell to the shops and swap it out, so why not a ring) Should be bought

New quests with moderate rewards

The option to smith dungeoneering armor (not the weapons, too overpowered) and mine the ores. The ores will be found in a new area, each one requiring a boss to be beaten before having access to the room. Once it is beaten, you can always enter the room without having to fight it again. They should also be bosses that require actual thinking, more than just run up and turning protect from magic on. Being able to make the primal amour should be something that you can be proud of, therefore none of the bars/ores/armors can be traded.

Adding onto that, the ores should re-spawn fairly slow, and there should only be a few, meaning loosing your armor set means taking a couple hours to forge it again.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQUEST] Donator Idea's?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:22, topic:465563”]Here’s a suggestion, just please note, it may suck.

They receive an amulet, they can then rub it. 24 choices will show up (or however many skills there are now) whatever skill they choose, it will give them 12 hours to ‘speed’ up the skill. For example, if someone chose woodcutting, they would chop more logs per/hr than a regular player.

This may be a tad bit contradicting, but oh well.[/quote]cause giving donors the eco is such a good idea

Read full topic

item.title: [REQUEST] Donator Idea's?
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

Here’s a suggestion, just please note, it may suck.

They receive an amulet, they can then rub it. 24 choices will show up (or however many skills there are now) whatever skill they choose, it will give them 12 hours to ‘speed’ up the skill. For example, if someone chose woodcutting, they would chop more logs per/hr than a regular player.

This may be a tad bit contradicting, but oh well.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQUEST] Donator Idea's?
item.dc:creator: @CoderJessee CoderJessee
item.description:
@CoderJessee wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:18, topic:465563”][quote author=CoderJessee link=topic=571023.msg4135743#msg4135743 date=1351686531]
True, my fould lol. Still need idea’s :rolleyes:.
[/quote]
We’re giving you ideas, you’re choosing not to listen. I’m sure a lot of people would agree with me here, donators shouldn’t get ‘special’ benefits that allow them to have a huge advantage over everyone else. Like Team_Rocket said, donators should get a gem of some sort that lets them get an instant slayer task, or something along the lines of that. Moving onto what Zyle said. It’s not a donation, it’s subscribing to a service. It’s like donating blood, you do it for the good of the community, not because you get something out of it.

You see were we are coming from?[/quote]
Yea, I ofcourse see, and I agree with you for a part, on the other hand, I’d like to give to give them some benefits, but that is 100% my opinion, and I respect yours. I will use most of your idea’s, cause some of them are cool :).

[quote=“ox random xi, post:19, topic:465563”]Suggestion;
Only put cosmetic stuff inside the donator store. And if there is armor or anything, make it untradable so the economy isn’t wrecked with someone that is rich IRL.[/quote]
I did that already, :P. Thanks for posting though!

Read full topic

You see were we are coming from?
